definitions.title: n.[f.]pl.
definitions.body: corals (? as branching cf. Ar. fananun branch of tree; so Mich Thes al.; > pearls Bo:Hieroz. 601 Di:Jb after Ra al.);—´[[פ]] fig. of value Pr 20:15; usu. ´[[מִפּ]], camp. Job 28:18, Pr 3:15 (Kt [[מפניים]]), Pr 8:11, Pr 31:10 (all of value), La 4:7 (of red colour); + Ps 45:14 (perh.; for [[פְּנִימָה]], q. v.).
